contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 6th day of March, 2012, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED; the Order of the Superior Court is VACATED; and the matter is REMANDED to the trial court for further proceedings consistent with this Court’s recent decision in K.E.M. v. P.C.S., 614 Pa. 508, 38 A.3d 798 (2012).
